title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 252 - Combined Returns And Statements And Single Payment Of Total Amount Of Taxes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 252 - Combined Returns And Statements And Single Payment Of Total Amount Of Taxes

State Regulations
§ 252.1 - Combined returns and employer's returns
§ 252.2 - Payment of a single amount to the State Tax Commission
§ 252.3 to 252.41 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 252

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a], 1332[a]; Codes and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §
92-92[a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
